headline: Closing Bell Movers: Amazon soars to all-time highs on earnings
summary: In the opening hour of the evening session, U.S. equity futures are notably higher, with S&P 500 up 0.5% and Nasdaq 100 contracts up 1.0%. In commodities, WTI Crude Oil is little changed just above $60 per barrel while precious metals are stronger for the 3rd day in a row – Gold is above $4,040 and Silver is approaching $49 per ounce. A strong slate of quarterly Tech results are helping stock futures restore positive sentiment in the segment that was wounded on Thursday by more dubious results o

headline: Edwards CFO Scott Ullem to exit post
summary: Ullem, who has held the position for more than a decade, will transition to an advisory role after his replacement is named by mid-2026.

raw.headline: Edwards CFO Scott Ullem to exit post
raw.summary: Ullem, who has held the position for more than a decade, will transition to an advisory role after his replacement is named by mid-2026.

headline: Demographic Megatrend: Stocks Poised to Benefit From Global Aging
summary: Global aging is reshaping healthcare demand. Discover how AbbVie, Amgen, Boston Scientific and Edwards are positioned to gain from this powerful megatrend.

headline: The 'Halo Effect' Bolstering Edwards Lifesciences' Biggest Moneymaker
summary: Edwards Lifesciences stock rose Friday after the medtech company boosted its 2025 outlook after beating quarterly calls.

headline: EW Stock Gains on Q3 Earnings and Revenue Beat, Margins Crash
summary: Edwards Lifesciences Q3 earnings and sales beat estimates on robust TAVR and TMTT growth, though margins take a sharp hit.

headline: Edwards boosts FY25 outlook after Q3 surpasses expectations
summary: Edwards Q3 2025 revenues grew to $1.55bn, reflecting an uplift of 14.7% from around $1.35bn in Q3 2024.

raw.headline: Edwards boosts FY25 outlook after Q3 surpasses expectations

headline: Edwards Lifesciences Corp (EW) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong Revenue Growth and ...
summary: Edwards Lifesciences Corp (EW) reports a 12.6% revenue increase and raises full-year sales and EPS guidance, showcasing robust performance across therapeutic areas.
